languages.text: "Скверна здесь. Я слышу ее в тенях — она стенает голосами пожранных ею душ".
"There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."
languages.original_text: "Скверна здесь. Я слышу ее в тенях — она стенает голосами пожранных ею душ".

traits.locale_text: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."
"There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."
"There is corruption in this holy chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

"There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

languages.text: "In dieser Kapelle haust die Verderbnis. Ich höre sie in den Schatten. Sie heult mit den Stimmen der Seelen, die sie verschlungen hat."
languages.original_text: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

traits.locale_text: "In dieser Kapelle haust die Verderbnis. Ich höre sie in den Schatten. Sie heult mit den Stimmen der Seelen, die sie verschlungen hat."

languages.text: « Cette chapelle suinte la corruption. Je l'entends dans les ombres, elle s'exprime avec les voix des âmes qu'elle a dévorées. »
languages.original_text: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

traits.locale_text: « Cette chapelle suinte la corruption. Je l'entends dans les ombres, elle s'exprime avec les voix des âmes qu'elle a dévorées. »

languages.text: «Esta capilla está corrompida. Lo oigo en las sombras: el gemido de las almas que ha devorado».
languages.original_text: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

traits.locale_text: «Esta capilla está corrompida. Lo oigo en las sombras: el gemido de las almas que ha devorado».

languages.text: 「この礼拝堂には腐敗があるわ。影の中で聞こえる。蝕まれた魂の声が慟哭している」
languages.original_text: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

traits.locale_text: 「この礼拝堂には腐敗があるわ。影の中で聞こえる。蝕まれた魂の声が慟哭している」

languages.text: “这间礼拜堂里有腐化的迹象。我能听到它发出了那些被它吞噬的灵魂的声音，在阴影中哀号。”
languages.original_text: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

traits.locale_text: “这间礼拜堂里有腐化的迹象。我能听到它发出了那些被它吞噬的灵魂的声音，在阴影中哀号。”

languages.original_text: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."

languages.text: "Bu şapelde yozlaşma mevcut. Sesini gölgelerde duyabiliyorum. Tükettiği ruhların sesleriyle feryat koparıyor."
languages.original_text: "There is corruption in this chapel. I can hear it in the shadows — it wails with the voices of the souls it has devoured."
